monstros.descricao: Abominoms  are enemies in the Philips CD-i game The Faces of Evil.
Arwings are unused enemies in Ocarina of Time.
Arurodas are scorpion-like enemies in The Adventure of Link.
Baby Dodongos are enemies in Ocarina of Time.
Arrow Traps are recurring traps in The Legend of Zelda series.
Babusu are shadow beings in A Link to the Past. They appear in the Ice Palace.
Baba Serpents are enemies in Twilight Princess.
The Armos Warrior is the Sub-Boss of Skull Dungeon in Oracle of Ages..
Arrgi are recurring Enemies in The Legend of Zelda series. Arrgi go unnamed in Ancient Stone Tablets.
Arpagos are recurring flying dragon-like enemies in The Legend of Zelda series.
